partnerDetails.about: 30 years of experience designing, building, testing and installing control systems for manufacturing and production processes, adapting to the specifics of each kind of industry (Water, Chemical, Automotive & Engines, Pharma, Food & Beverage, Paper, Energy, Metal & Mining,..).We help our customers automate tasks (reduce human intervention), monitor, control and manage the data from their manufacturing processes. We also design and build test rigs for production and quality.Today, SPIN group consists in four companies strategically located in Barcelona(Spain), Worcester(England), Kuala Lumpur(Malaysia) and Perth(Australia), to give the proper service to our clients worldwide.

We also design and build test rigs for production and quality.Today, SPIN group consists in four companies strategically located in Barcelona(Spain), Worcester(England), Kuala Lumpur(Malaysia) and Perth(Australia), to give the proper service to our clients worldwide.
